body:
Comment 1: 
This has already been discussed:
https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/58DL23OOOPc/discussion

The feature exists in Python. I don't use it, i recommend not using it in reviews,
because it's extremely confusing.

Your example can be very simply implemented as

func Find(list []int, needle int) (int, error) {
    for i, n := range list {
        if n == needle {
            return i, nil
        }
    }
    return -1, errNotFound
}
_Labels changed: added **languagechange**._
